oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Discharge paper for T. H. Freeman
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Notification of honorable discharge for T. H. Freeman from Captain John H. McLarin's Company F, 45th Tennessee Volunteers. Freeman enlisted on December 12, 1861. He was discharged due to medical disability. Freeman was born in Wilson County, Tennessee. At the time of discharge, he was 26 years old, 5 feet 10 inches tall, with light complexion and hair, and blue eyes. He was a farmer by profession.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
